title: That Scene with Dan Patrick Trailer
itunes:title: That Scene with Dan Patrick Trailer
description:
In "That Scene with Dan Patrick," legendary sports broadcaster Dan Patrick chats with celebrities and filmmakers to break down some of the most iconic scenes from their careers. Listen in as they share their early reactions to the script, details about how the scene actually got made, their response to watching it on screen for the first time, and reflections on the scene's impact -- both personal and cultural. With Dan Patrick’s humor and passion for movies guiding the conversation, listeners enjoy a journey with some of Hollywood’s biggest names through some of the most memorable scenes in TV and movie history. Upcoming guests include Will Ferrell, Adam Sandler, Bryan Cranston, and David Spade.


Listen to Dan’s episode with Adam Sandler today: http://amzn.to/ThatScene

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
